Welcome to LOONAVERSE
歡迎嚟到 LOOΠΔ 本月少女討論區


本月少女（LOOΠΔ，韓語：이달의 소녀）是 Blockberry Creative 娛樂於 2018 年 8 月 19 日推出的 12 人女子團體。從 2016 年 9 月開始，每月公布一名成員，出道前宣傳計劃將會持續 18 個月。12 名成員公開的順序為 HeeJin、HyunJin、HaSeul、YeoJin、ViVi、Kim Lip、JinSoul、Choerry、Yves、Chuu、Go Won、Olivia Hye，並已出道三個小分隊，LOOΠΔ ⅓、 ODD EYE CIRCLE 和 yyxy。每名成員會發行一張單曲，其中均有至少一首該成員的 solo 曲。團體於 8 月 19 日舉辦出道演唱會正式出道，8 月 20 日發行首張迷你專輯《+ +》。官方粉絲名為「Orbit」（韓語：오빛），寓意月球軌道（Lunar orbit），同時韓語中的「빛」有「光」的意味。

小分隊

本月少女 ⅓ LOOΠΔ ⅓


本月少女 1/3 是本月少女的首個小分隊，由ViVi、夏瑟、姬振、賢眞、汝真組成，以清純風格為特色。分隊隊長是夏瑟。
本分隊得名的由來，是結成時成員為4人（姬振、賢眞、夏瑟、ViVi），正好是組合總人數12人的三分之一。出道活動結束後，汝真加入，「1/3」也有了最初連續公開的姬振、賢眞、夏瑟「3」人，未參與出道活動的汝真「/」，與被隔開的ViVi 「1」人的含意，連起來成為「1/3」。

Q&A

Q1) 究竟幾時先齊十二人出道？
A1) 2018年3月已公開全部十二名成員，十二人完全體於8月19日舉辦出道演唱會，8月20日發行首張迷你專輯《+ +》及舉辦出道Showcase正式出道。

Q2) 啲 MV 好似好多伏線，係咪背後有另外一個故事？
A2) 係。至於個故事係講乜就不妨留個言大家一齊研究下。

Q3) 邊度可以買碟支持佢哋？
A3) 可以喺 ig 搵 loona_hk 代購。如果想快啲到手可以去信和, cdw 或者 hmv 搵，有信用卡亦可以係 Gmarket Synnara 買。如果要海報最好一出碟就買，否則過咗一排賣曬就有錢都未必搵得返。

Q4) 想同人換小卡，可以點做？
A4) 可以加入本月少女 telegram 吹水 group 同大家溝通下，至於換唔換到就睇你好唔好彩啦。入咗 group 都唔好唔記得上嚟留下言推 post。

BTS and LOONA were winners at this year’s MTV Europe Music Awards (EMAs)!

The 2018 MTV EMAs were held on November 4 (local time) at the Bilbao Exhibition Center in Spain. The awards ceremony celebrates the musical acts and music videos that drew the most popularity in Europe that year, with winners being determined by online fan votes.

This year’s winners included both BTS and LOONA. BTS took home both the 2018 MTV EMA Biggest Fans Award and the Best Group Award. For the Biggest Fans Award, BTS won over Camila Cabello, Selena Gomez, Shawn Mendes, and Taylor Swift. For Best Group, BTS beat out 5 Seconds of Summer and PRETTYMUCH to take home the prize.

This year’s Best Korean Act Award went to rookie group LOONA. They were nominated this year alongside WJSN (Cosmic Girls), (G)I-DLE, Golden Child, and PENTAGON. Previous winners of the Best Korean Act were EXO in 2013, B.A.P in 2014 and 2016, BTS in 2015, and GFRIEND in 2017.

Congratulations to both groups!

The lineup has been confirmed for 2018 MAMA Premiere in Korea!

The opening event for the 2018 Mnet Asian Music Awards (hereafter 2018 MAMA) will feature various rookies and also announce the winners of Best New Male Artist and Best New Female Artist.

Rookies who will be attending are rappers HAON and VINXEN, Hyeongseop X Euiwoong, Kim Dong Han, Stray Kids, The Boyz, fromis_9, (G)I-DLE, GWSN, IZ*ONE, LOONA, and NATURE. All of them are nominees for Best New Artist this year.

2018 MAMA Premiere in Korea will be held at Dongdaemun Design Plaza on December 10. Tickets for the event will only be given to winners of the #LikeMAMA campaign event online and will not be sold separately.

Following 2018 MAMA Premiere in Korea, the ceremonies will continue in Japan on December 12 and in Hong Kong on December 14.
